title: Spotify to list shares worth up to $444.6 million
text: March 20, 2018 / 8:23 PM / a few seconds ago Spotify to list shares worth up to $444.6 million Reuters Staff 1 Min Read (Reuters) - Streaming music leader Spotify Technology SA ( SPOT.N ) on Tuesday filed for a direct listing of its shares worth up to $444.6 million. Earphones are seen on a tablet screen with a Spotify logo on it, in Zenica, Bosnia and Herzegovina, February 20, 2014. REUTERS/Dado Ruvic/File Photo In an amended filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, the company expects shareholders to sell up to 55.7 million ordinary shares. ( bit.ly/2u77nhu ) Spotifyâ€™s direct listing will let investors and employees sell shares without the company raising new capital or hiring a Wall Street bank or broker to underwrite the offering. Reporting by Supantha Mukherjee in Bengaluru; Editing by Shounak Dasgupta
